snippet.title: Boulder Boy Kickstarter Teaser
snippet.description:
Boulder Boy is a new title that harkens back to the classic Japanese design sensibilities of the 80’s and 90’s. Boulder Boy is inspired by fondly remembered titles such as The Adventures of Lolo, Sokoban, Pengo and Kickle Cubicle.

Striving for those classic aesthetics, Boulder Boy certainly looks the part with beautiful retro sprite art and pulsing NES-style synths.

For More information, please check out our Kickstarter: 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/boulderboy/boulder-boy-a-retro-game-throwback-that-rocks

Support us on other social media platforms:

https://www.facebook.com/boulderboygame/
https://twitter.com/bikkurigames
https://www.instagram.com/bikkurigames/

Roll on!
